product_name: The North Face Shellisto Mid Boots - Men's
long_description: The North Face Shellisto Mid boots combine a contemporary look with waterproof protection and warm insulation to take you from the city streets to the mountain trails in style and comfort. Attractive waterproof leather uppers keep moisture from snow and rain from getting in. 100g Heatseeker(TM) insulation in the shafts and 200g Heatseeker(TM) insulation in the collars and forefeet keep your toes warm. EVA midsoles and half shanks support your feet. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles supply tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions; omnidirectional lugs are both grippy and self-cleaning. Temperature-sensitive Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing extra bite into the terrain.
short_description: The North Face Shellisto Mid boots combine a contemporary look with waterproof protection and warm insulation to take you from the city streets to the mountain trails in style and comfort.
